featured.text:
Radius Festival is a celebration of video games for everyone, a games exhibition, live show and game jam. On the show Vlambeer's Rami Ismail, Adriel Wallick, Georg Backer and guests present exiting games big and small directly with their developers and check in with the game jam - with the winning games presented on the Sunday show. Together they discover the great diversity of the games world, full of talent, entertainment and fun.


Click here to watch and chat.
